CustomField.description: Links to an event's Files page.
CustomField.formula: IF( RecordTypeId = "01214000000AUym", HYPERLINK("https://erepublic.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/SFL5_Projects__c/"&Id&"/related/Projects__r/view", "View Project Files" , "_blank"), HYPERLINK("https://erepublic.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/AttachedContentDocument/"&Id&"/related/AttachedContentDocuments/view", "View Event Lists and Files" , "_blank") )
CustomField.label: Event Files Link
